scripts.start: concurrently -n "server,client" -c "blue,green" "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently -n "server,client" -c "blue,green" "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.format: cd server && npm run format && cd client && npm run format
scripts.test: npm -w server test && npm -w client test
scripts.test:coverage: npm -w server test -- --run --coverage && npm -w client test -- --run --coverage
